Slope.NAME: Slope
Slope.DESC: Slope - Steepness of raster cell derived from USGS 1/3 arcsec DEM for United States

Terrain Ruggedness Index.NAME: Terrain Ruggedness Index
Terrain Ruggedness Index.DESC: Terrain Ruggedness Index (TRI) - elevation difference between adjacent raster cells derived from USGS 1/3 arcsec DEM for United States

Roads.NAME: Roads
Roads.DESC: OSM dataset of roads including everything between highways and residential roads

Temporary flight restrictions.NAME: Temporary flight restrictions
Temporary flight restrictions.DESC: Temporary Flight Restrictions imposed by the FAA to restrict aircraft operations within designated areas

Airspace schedule.NAME: Airspace schedule
Airspace schedule.DESC: Controlled airspace schedule for select airports across the country (geometry has no bearing on the result)

Prisons.NAME: Prisons
Prisons.DESC: Prison locations in the United States

Streams.NAME: Streams
Streams.DESC: Stream polylines throughout the United States

Balloonports.NAME: Balloonports
Balloonports.DESC: Balloonport points buffered at 1 nautical mile

Daytime population data.NAME: Daytime population data
Daytime population data.DESC: Population points that represent an approximate measure of how many people are in a specific area during the day across the United States

Glideports.NAME: Glideports
Glideports.DESC: Glideport points buffered at 1 nautical mile

Ultralight.NAME: Ultralight
Ultralight.DESC: Ultralight landing points buffered at 1 nautical mile

NRHP Location Points.DESC: Historic properties listed on the National Register of Historic Places (points)

NRHP Location Polygons.NAME: NRHP Location Polygons
NRHP Location Polygons.DESC: Historic properties listed on the National Register of Historic Places (polygons)

Stadium.NAME: Stadium
Stadium.DESC: Select stadiums containing temporary flight restriction. The stadium points are buffered by 3 nautical miles

Railroad bridges.DESC: All railroad bridges in the United States

Recreational Flyer Fixed Sites.DESC: Active flying fields that are established by an agreement with the FAA

Community advisories.NAME: Community advisories
Community advisories.DESC: Advisories are areas of airspace in which governments seek to alert pilots of additional risk

Veteran health facilities.NAME: Veteran health facilities
Veteran health facilities.DESC: Health facility polygons for United States veterans of the armed forces

Helipads.NAME: Helipads
Helipads.DESC: Helipad locations throughout the United States

Bodies of water.NAME: Bodies of water
Bodies of water.DESC: General bodies of water in the United States

Child Care Centers.NAME: Child Care Centers
Child Care Centers.DESC: Child Care Centers in the United States

Railroad lines.NAME: Railroad lines
Railroad lines.DESC: Railroad network of the United States

Population Night.NAME: Population Night
Population Night.DESC: Population points that represent an approximate measure of how many people are in a specific area during the day across the United States

Hazards.NAME: Hazards
Hazards.DESC: Hazards contain various types of infrastructure

Landscan Day Polygon.DESC: Population points that represent an approximate measure of how many people are in a specific area during the day across the United States

Digital elevation model.DESC: CONUS digital elevation model in ft

Land use land cover.NAME: Land use land cover
Land use land cover.DESC: Land use land cover data binned into h3 hexagons with english labels applied

Convention centers and fairgrounds.NAME: Convention centers and fairgrounds
Convention centers and fairgrounds.DESC: Locations of convention centers, conference centers, exposition centers, and fairgrounds for the 50 U.S. states, D.C., and the territory of Puerto Rico

Electric substations.NAME: Electric substations
Electric substations.DESC: Electric substations dispersed throughout the United States

EMS stations.DESC: Emergency Medical Service (EMS) stations throughout the United States

Fire stations.NAME: Fire stations
Fire stations.DESC: Fire stations throughout the United States

Government buildings.NAME: Government buildings
Government buildings.DESC: Government buildings throughout the United States

Hospitals.NAME: Hospitals
Hospitals.DESC: Hospital locations throughout the United States

Military facilities.NAME: Military facilities
Military facilities.DESC: Military base locations in the United States

Controlled Airspace Classification.DESC: Airspace that is under FAA control

Special use airspace.DESC: Special use airspace contains both prohibited and restricted airspace; see https://www.faa.gov/air_traffic/publications/atpubs/aim_html/chap3_section_4.html for more details

Full Time National Security UAS Flight R.DESC: Any full time flight restriction, created for national security purposes

Washington DC Flight Restricted Zone.DESC: The prohibited flight restriction zone around the capitol

UAS Facility Management Flight Ceiling.DESC: Maximum altitude features surrounding airports where the FAA enables operations

Part Time National Security UAS Flight R.DESC: Any part time flight restriction, created for national security purposes

Urgent care facilities.DESC: Urgent care facilities dispersed throughout the United States

Wind farms.DESC: Polygons representing coverage of individual wind turbines
